text: Hi there, I'm wondering if anyone has any good resources for *well thought out developer/CI/devops workflows* for HubSpot CMS, for inspiration. This means testing, continious integration, git, etc etc.

Hello and nice to get into this community! I am happy to join! I work with a tech startup developing a computer vision platform for forest industry. We have just started to use HubSpot and are looking forward to start integrating it into our own systems!
